frontmatter.title: How I migrated from Redux and Saga to MobX and became a happier person
frontmatter.keywords: mobx, redux, saga, react, ui, frontend, state management
frontmatter.description: For quite a while I was using Redux together with Redux Saga and was satisfied. Well, sort of, because I was constantly asking myself "Should the state management always be that complex?" Redux was a great library for it's time, when the concept of a centralized state was not well-coined yet. Nevertheless, one day came, and I have decided it was time to move.
